sentence.Network_en: The surgeon cut through connective tissue to expose the bone.

sentence.Network_en: The dermis is composed of the connective tissue that supports the epidermis.
sentence.Network_cn: 真皮是由支撑表皮的结蒂组织构成的.

sentence.Network_en: It is also encased in membranes of connective tissue called the meninges.
sentence.Network_cn: 它还被一些结缔组织的膜所包裹,这些膜叫做脑膜.

entry.def: A connective is the same as a conjunction .

means.word_mean: 1. an uninflected function word that serves to conjoin words or phrases or clauses or sentences

sentences.sentence: "he didn't have the right connector between the amplifier and the speakers"
